title: RHEM
description:
Title: RHEM
Genre: adventure / puzzle-solving / 1st-person
Released: 28th June 2003
Developer: Knut Mueller
Publisher: RuneSoft
Description:
What is this place and why are you here? An intriguing first-person 3D adventure set in a mysterious land, RHEM features non-linear gameplay and a captivating story. Your only hope of escaping the land of RHEM lies in the contents of a letter which must be found, pieced together, and successfully delivered. In search of clues, explore desert and water landscapes rich in environmental details that will lead to your ultimate escape!

How to play:
1) Run rhem_setup.exe and install the game;
2) Start the game using its main executable or shortcuts (DRM free).

! Notice
You must have QuickTime installed to view the in-game cinematics. You can use QuickTime_Alternative_322.exe to install QuickTime Alternative.

If you like the game, BUY it!
